siteMetadata.title: Jack Harner
siteMetadata.description: Jack Harner is a Freelance Web Developer & E-Commerce Consultant based in Denver, Colorado. Shopify, BigCommerce, WordPress Dev & More.
siteMetadata.author: @jackharner

markdownRemark.html:
Becoming a Full Time Freelancer without a Computer Science Degree ðŸ˜‰

I was asked to interview on the No CS Degree blog. The blog focuses on people working in tech and web development that never received a computer science degree. It's a testament to all the self / community taught developers out there, as well as the people who transitioned into tech later in their life.

Thanks Pete for inviting me on!
